thread.title: Shannen Doherty Completes Chemo Almost Two Years After Cancer Diagnosis (PHOTO)
thread.title_full: Shannen Doherty Completes Chemo Almost Two Years After Cancer Diagnosis (PHOTO)

author: Zakiya Jamal
title: Shannen Doherty Completes Chemo Almost Two Years After Cancer Diagnosis (PHOTO)
text:
February 25, 2017 by Zakiya Jamal 0 Shares 
Shannen Doherty is done with chemo! 
The actress took to Instagram to share the good news with her followers, but also to remind them the journey isn’t over. Credit: Shannen Doherty on Instagram 
The 45-year-old’s last day of chemotherapy came almost two years after her cancer diagnosis in March 2015 , and it was a long journey. Credit: Instagram 
“#fbf to this morning… not that long ago,” she wrote in the caption. 
“Last day of chemo. Exhausted.” Credit: Instagram 
The Beverly Hills, 90210 star then went on to discuss what she faces next in her ongoing battle against cancer. Credit: Shannen Doherty on Instagram 
“Now that I’m done with chemo and radiation, the waiting game is here,” she wrote. 
“Waiting for test. Waiting to see if I’m clear or not. Waiting for reconstruction. Waiting.” Credit: Instagram 
“I think when one gets cancer, they are always waiting to a certain extent,” she continued. 
“To those who know… I’m waiting with you. #cancerslayer.” A post shared by ShannenDoherty (@theshando) on Feb 21, 2017 at 8:31pm PST 
The Charmed star has continued to use social media to document the ups and downs of her battle, from chemotherapy appointments to happy moments with her husband and dog. A post shared by ShannenDoherty (@theshando) on Feb 24, 2017 at 8:47am PST 
We hope that this is a turn in the right direction for Shannen’s recovery and wish her the best. You can see the photo she shared above.
